author: jeastman
msg: MAHOUT-479: Fixed a bug in TestVectorModelClassifier and messed around with pdf() in GaussianCluster and ASNModel. Synthetic control seems to work better on Dirichlet now but I'm troubled by the impact of the two pdf() implementations on the outcome.
